question: To _____ the race（賽跑）, our class practiced very hard and hoped we could make it this time.
Don't be _____ of making mistakes when speaking English.
Ann: Liz and I plan to go to Kenting this weekend.  We feel like doing our favorite water activity.  Would you like to join us?  Zoe: Sure.  _____ me in!
Why am I not smart enough?  I failed to answer the _____ question on the math test, but most of my classmates were able to make it.  How could that be?
Mom _____ that I passed the road test, but I made a terrible mistake during the test.  She felt very disappointed（失望的）.
I study hardest of the three children in my family, but how come I get the worst _____?
You don't have to open the door with a key（鑰匙）.  Just _____ it open.
Could you help me _____ the money?  Every time I do, I get a different total.
Michael Phelps is a(n) _____ swimmer.  He broke many world records and won first place many times.
It's 6:30 p.m.  The movie will _____ in fifteen minutes.  Let's hurry up!
My wife is _____ at making fried chicken.  Want to come to our house and give it a try?
My mom will get mad with my poor grade in English again.  I _____ it the third time this month.
If I don't pass the tests in school, my mom will never _____ me to watch TV on weekends.
It looks like rain.  I'm _____ we can't visit the zoo later.
Joe is the best basketball player on the team.  He always gets the most _____ of all.
Luke's only son is really a _____ boy.  He does the best in math.
Joe: Is your sister _____ play the piano?  Leo: Of course.  She's a music teacher.  Remember?
Jim, you failed the English test again today, but why weren't you _____ with me?  You said you passed it, didn't you?
We have a(n) _____ on Monday mornings.  It usually lasts about two hours.  It makes all of us nervous and tired.
Greg: You're a boy, aren't you?  Don't throw a ball like a girl.  Pete: _____  Stop talking like that.  Sometimes girls do a better job than boys when playing sports, like Dai Ziying.
Never _____ trash on the ground.  Be sure to put it into the trash can（桶）.
Grandpa's eightieth birthday is _____.  How are we going to celebrate it this time?
Every time my mom has my brother clean up his bedroom, he always makes some _____ and puts it off（拖延它）.  It makes my mom mad with him.
The turtle is the animal my sister is most _____ of.  She cries and runs away even when she sees a picture of one.〔100. 基測Ⅱ〕
Never let gender stereotypes _____ you.  You can be special and different in your own way.
He'll move to the country and just live a _____ life.  It's great to stay away from the busy life in the big city.
Can't you learn something from the past _____?
If I join the science fair with your group, my poor grades in science might _____ you _____.
My son is in the ninth _____, so that's the reason why he's as busy as a bee almost every day both at home and at school.
The beach is a perfect place to visit on hot summer days, but let's _____ it _____: Never leave any trash in the sea or on the beach.
The fork is a little dirty.  Let's ask the waitress to _____ a clean one for us.
Anna: I have no one to ask when I study at home by myself.  Beth: Why don't you join the study _____?  Everyone in it can study and help each other.
Miss Dai's hard work _____ winning many world records.
I didn't _____ to fail the Chinese test.  I thought I did well.
Dancing can be a _____ for two strangers（陌生人）.  They can understand（了解）each other when they dance together.〔111.會考補考〕
See the ruler on your left?  _____ it to me, please.  I need to draw a straight line.
It's common that most people _____ a doctor as a man.  I'm one of them.  How about you?
It'll be much better for you to look at the thing from different _____.
I expected that you can go to Taipei with me tomorrow, but now it doesn't _____.  I'll go by myself.
Holding gender stereotypes may _____ people into hiding their true selves and lead to losing many talents.
Almost everyone in my family likes swimming very much, but _____ me, I like it the least because I will never forget the experience of drowning in the sea at the age of five.
Money is not everything, and let's live our lives _____, shall we?
If all else _____, we can always stay at home and watch TV.
Alice learned from the TV news _____ Nora Jones was coming to Taiwan the next day.〔97.基測Ⅰ〕
Robert: Charles wanted to borrow $1,000 from me yesterday.  Mandy: You didn't lend him the money, _____?〔96.基測Ⅱ〕
Joe believes _____ he'll become a doctor one day.
Teaching is learning, _____?
The girl with an umbrella is very pretty, _____?
Emi: Bob and Sue will get married（結婚）, _____they?  Ted: Why not?  They love each other so much, _____ they?
Your sister will leave for Taipei later, _____ she?
The boy should not draw on the wall, _____?
My father told me last night _____ we're going to the Food Festival this weekend.  My brother and I felt very excited（感到興奮的）.〔99.基測Ⅱ〕
The tall man over there is our new English teacher, _____?〔98.基測Ⅱ〕
You _____ at home last night, _____ you?
Dad is too busy right now, _____ he?  Let's ask Mom for help.
Our mom read the book, _____?
Tom's sister put it on the ground, _____?
My mom told my sister and me _____ she would take us to the concert of our favorite singing group－BTS.
Lucy: Do you think Sally and Martin should get married（結婚）?  Rose: Why not?  They love each other, _____?〔97.基測Ⅰ〕
Alice really likes having noodles for breakfast, _____?〔100.基測Ⅰ〕
Make sure _____ you'll give it back to me tomorrow.
I was surprised（感到驚訝的）to know from the newspaper（報紙）yesterday _____ flowers do not always smell sweet; some can smell like dead fish.〔102.基測〕
Mr. and Mrs. Lu _____ a bigger new house, don't they?
The man put it on before going out, _____?
Christmas is _____ the corner.  Why don't we do some shopping at the gift shop _____ the corner?
I'm scared _____ the black shape will stand next to my bed again and again during the night.
Helping fight for the poor labor workers sounds like a good idea, _____?
Alice has no friends here in Taiwan, _____?
There isn't a hat on the door, _____?
Getting up early on a cold morning is not easy, _____?〔104.會考〕
Grandpa has to take the medicine three times a day, _____ he?
Have a cup of coffee, _____?
Mom seldom let me play too many computer games when I was young, _____?
When you are sick, you'll go see a doctor, _____ you?
I'm afraid _____ it might be COVID-19.
She heard _____ her favorite basketball team finally won the game.
The young waitress looks busy, _____?
Open the door for me,_____?
There's lots of snow in Japan in winter, _____?
There's nothing special on TV tonight, _____?
Ken: Most of the workers don't like their boss, Mr. Coleman, _____?  Flora: Well, the truth is that they all like him.
Let's eat out tonight, _____?
There are too many people on the motorcycle, _____?
Danny's wife, Iris, read few books on weekends, _____?
Don't laugh at them, _____?
She's going to the USA, _____ she?〔94.基測Ⅰ〕
Never be mean to your younger brother, _____?
That's not art, _____?
Jill: Do you do well _____ English?  Lisa: Sure.  I always get good grades _____ English tests.
Are you telling me _____ you are scared _____ listening to scary stories?
Sean can eat nothing when he feels under the weather, _____?
Don't you think _____ should be a new clock on the wall?
Being poor did not stop him _____ his high school.
The man never takes any _____ when he has a cold.  He only has warm water.
Look at the picture.  What happened to the girl?
At _____, we can have lunch for thirty minutes, and then we need to clean the classroom.
Don't eat so fast, or you may get a _____ easily.
Joan: Lynn, the silk scarf（絲巾）around your _____ is pretty.  Where did you buy it?　Lynn: It was a gift from my cousin.
I have a _____, and I can't swallow（吞嚥）anything.
I'm not feeling _____.  My head hurts a lot.
In summer it is _____ to stay in my parents' room because it is air-conditioned（有冷氣的）.〔92.基測Ⅰ〕
My parents _____ work in the post office.
Is it _____ to have beef soup for breakfast in Tainan?
Ouch!  I hurt my _____.  I can't walk now.
For me, lying（躺）on the bed is the most _____ after one-day tiring（累人的）work.
I can't understand（了解）that.  Can you give me some _____?
Kent, your _____ are too long.  Please cut them now.
You have a bad _____.  You shouldn't eat ice cream.  Just have some warm water.
It's cold in the morning and at night.  If you don't want to have a _____, bring a jacket with you.
Most of us don't like Tracy because she often gets angry for no _____.
My uncle always drinks ginger tea to _____ his cough.
This morning I took my daughter's temperature（溫度）.  It was 40 ℃.  She had a _____, and I took her to the doctor.
Six of my classmates didn't go to school today because they all got _____.
Mandy helps her parents at the juice _____ at the night market after school every day.  What a sweet daughter!
Ben: Don't touch my right _____.  I got hurt yesterday.　Wendy: Sorry.
Derek: What is your grandpa doing?　Jennifer: He's taking _____ in his bedroom.
_____, Alan doesn't like guavas, but he doesn't know how to say no to you.
Debby is shorter than me, but her _____ are longer than mine.
The girl picked a red flower and put it on her _____.
This is the biggest night market in Kaohsiung.  There are more than one hundred _____ here.
Jim grew up with many animals at home and knows well how to _____ pets.〔98.基測Ⅰ〕
Thank you for the book.  It's really _____ for my science homework.
Little Amanda, _____ of your hands are so dirty.  What did you do?  Go wash them now!
Nina: Oh my!  Stop watering the plants.  Too much water can kill them.  Chris: Sorry, I didn't know that.  I was just trying to be _____.
Thanks for your notebook.  It's _____ for my test（考試）.
Sam, you should set（設立）a good _____ to your little sister.  Don't talk with your mouth full.
Eddie often makes trouble.  He's a big _____ to his parents.
It's _____ to see someone with a smartphone（智慧型手機）in his / her hand on the metro.
Are Jay and Tim really brothers?  In fact, they don't look like each other, and they have nothing in _____.
Vivi: What flavor（口味）of cake do you want?　Daisy: _____
Neil: I'm so sorry, Sarah.　Sarah: It doesn't _____.
Peggy loves animals.  She spends lots of time and money _____ stray（流浪的）dogs or cats every week.
Lydia: You didn't go to Nanny's party last night.  Did you _____ to her?　Hank: No.  She didn't want to listen to me.
Jimmy would not get up for breakfast, _____ his dad had already（早已試過）tried to pull（拉）him from his bed several（數個）times.〔110.會考〕
I have a spoon of _____ before going to bed every day.  It helps me sleep well.
My mom uses a lot of _____ in the dish.
On cold days, my cats love to lie（躺）on the couch（沙發）because it is warm and _____.〔96.基測Ⅰ〕
Samuel: Can you explain “Two _____ are better than one” to me?  Molly: It means two or more people will do better than one person by himself or herself.
Mommy, I don't _____ staying home.  Can I go biking for one hour?
The noise those boys are making is giving me a(n)_____.  Can you do anything about it?〔100.基測Ⅰ〕
When I stay up for tests（考試）, hot coffee is a _____.
Mrs. Wang has two sons.  _____ of them go to junior high school.〔90.基測Ⅰ〕
I cannot understand（了解）why Steven bought so many watches but never wears _____ of them.〔99. 基測Ⅰ〕
Most of _____ at this juice shop is great.  Many people come here for it.
_____ of the members（成員）in my family hate the taste and smell of the durian（榴槤）.  Few of them like to eat it.
There are many trees in the park.  _____ of them are over fifty years old.〔94. 基測Ⅱ〕
_____ of his parents are doctors, and _____ of his sisters are doctors, too.  His youngest sister is a famous writer here in Taiwan.
_____ of my parents are doctors, and _____ of my two brothers is, too.
_____ Annie knows fast food is not good for her health, she still eats it.〔102.基測〕
_____ of the students in my school do not have the experience of going to a foreign country.  Only a few do.〔93.基測Ⅱ〕
Some of the players _____ my classmates.
Nana and Fred are good friends, and _____ are baseball fans.〔90.基測Ⅱ〕
_____ he is eighty years old, he's well and seldom sick.
These ten players are top players; _____ of them are good at throwing a ball.
_____ of the gift boxes are already put（被放置）under the Christmas tree.〔96. 基測Ⅱ〕
Some of the oranges at that supermarket _____ fresh.
Elsa: Do you know anyone from Class A?　Jeff: No, I don't know any of _____.〔96.基測Ⅰ〕
of his parents are happy for him.
of my sisters are older than I am.  I'm the youngest of the three children in my family.〔109.會考〕
My grandfather spends _____ of his free time reading newspapers.〔92.基測Ⅱ〕
I have three brothers.  _____ of them are doctors.
_____ Joe looks strong, in fact he gets sick easily.〔97.基測Ⅰ〕
of the students don't have the experience of going camping.  Only a few do.
There are many tall boys in the class, and my son is _____ of them.
Kevin studied hard _____ he didn't do well on the test（考試）.
Most of the girls' hair _____ long.
My uncle didn't see a doctor _____ he had a cold.
Most of the bread _____ yummy, but I'll eat _____ of it because I'm still full.
_____ of the players on the school team is the tallest student in our school.
_____ most of the cheese come from the USA?
How many of _____ are able to（能夠）play the guitar?
Sara wasn't very hungry, so she ate _____ of the steak.
_____ of my friends has a bike.  We all go to school by bike every day.
_____ of Sam's money is on the desk in his bedroom.  He doesn't bring any money with him now.
of the books on my desk is interesting.  You can borrow _____ of them from me.
Mr. Chen used to（原本）own three 3C shops, but now he has only one to keep running（經營）.  He closed _____ last month because the business（生意）was very bad.
_____ of them needs to clean the classroom.
Each one of them _____ surfing the Internet（上網）.
Ben: Did you eat the cookies on the table?  Sue: No, I didn't eat any of _____.
Would you mind opening the door for me?  There are a few books in _____ of my hands.
All of the money on the sofas _____ mine, so please don't take _____ away.
My sister has lots of dresses, but she never wears _____ of them.  Isn't that very funny?
Most of the food at the restaurants _____ delicious.
My dad spends _____ of his time working at the factory.
One of the members（成員）_____ to eat Chinese food.
Michelle Walden, _____ of the best basketball players in our school history, was called “Flying Walden” because she could jump very high.〔100.基測Ⅱ〕
Some of the medicine _____ very expensive.
John had three girlfriends before.  He broke up with（與⋯分手）_____ of them, so he has only one girlfriend now.
That's a lot of food.  Can you finish _____?
of the students are able to（能夠）ride any farther.  _____ of them are tired.
Some of _____ comes from the USA.
_____ of the tea comes from Japan, and _____ of the cakes are from the USA.
Mom bought a lot of food this morning.  All of _____ looks delicious.
I have two pens.  _____ of them is red.
of the students _____ tired of playing basketball.  They want to become strong and healthy by playing sports.
_____ of my brothers likes playing video games.  They love it very much.
_____ of my hands is full.  Would you please open the door for me?
_____ of the apples on the table is for your father, so just leave it there, my dear sons.
